title.rendered: 5 Pack Gym T Shirts Men Dry Fit Sport

content.rendered:
Product details

Material Composition
100% Polyester
Care Instructions
Machine Wash
Closure Type
Pull On
Neck Style
Crew Neck

About this item

  • 【Breathable Fabric】This men’s sports t-shirt is made of unique 4-way stretch fabric, machine washable, lightweight, elastic, sweat wicking and quick drying, which prevents odour residue on the fabric and stays in place after repeated washing.
  • 【Ergonomic Comfort】This men’s plain t-shirt is designed with a tagless flat seam neckline to prevent chafing and increase comfort. The raglan sleeves allow full freedom of arm movement without restriction.
  • 【Loose Fit & Crew Neck】This men’s running shirt is cut in a loose fit. Designed with short sleeves, this sweatshirt is sporty and comfortable to wear. You can wear it as a workout shirt or as a base layer for your jacket.
  • 【Applicable Occasions】This sweatshirt is perfect for casual, fitness, golf, hiking, cycling, basketball, also great for running, hiking, marathon, training, aerobics and all other favourite sports.
  • 【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】If you have any problem with our men’s training clothes, please contact us, our team will reply you within 24 hours, you will get 30 days guarantee and 100% money back. Wish you have a pleasant shopping experience.
